item.title: Romney Economics: Republicans on Romney's Massachusetts Record
item.description: Inbox: New OFA Web Video Highlights Broad Republican Criticism of Romney’s Massachusetts Record http://t.co/qbJBW6vD
item.content:encoded: Inbox: New OFA Web Video Highlights Broad Republican Criticism of Romney’s Massachusetts Record http://t.co/qbJBW6vD Learn more: https://my.barackobama.com/romneyeconomicsgopvid Mitt Romney ran for governor of Massachusetts promising more jobs, decreased debt, and smaller government. By the time Romney left office, state debt had increased, the size of government had grown, and Massachusetts had fallen behind almost every other state in job creation. Other Republicans agree: Romney economics didn't work then, and it won't work now. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: youtube.com

item.title: More bad news for Facebook, as site crashes
item.description: More bad news for Facebook, as site crashes: Facebook isn’t having a good May. First its IPO didn’t “pop” and then... http://t.co/ZPozZWdn
item.content:encoded: More bad news for Facebook, as site crashes: Facebook isn’t having a good May. First its IPO didn’t “pop” and then... http://t.co/ZPozZWdn Facebook isn’t having a good May. First its IPO didn’t “pop” and then the stock traded down the week after it went public. And on Thursday night the social network experienced a substantial outage, going dark for up to 80 minutes for some people. The site is still loading slowly for me and is apparently out for some people at 6:35 PT. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: gigaom.com

item.title: Un esclarecimiento honesto | Cubadebate
item.description: REFLEXIÓN DE FIDEL: Un esclarecimiento honesto http://t.co/JEHe1Y5F #Cuba @reflexionfidel @cubadebate
item.content:encoded: REFLEXIÓN DE FIDEL: Un esclarecimiento honesto http://t.co/JEHe1Y5F #Cuba @reflexionfidel @cubadebate Hace unos días, el 28 de mayo, se conmemoró con merecidas referencias el violento Combate del Uvero. Un deber elemental me obliga a esclarecer los hechos. (...) Fue acaso correcto desde el punto de vista militar y revolucionario atacar la guarnición atrincherada y bien armada en la misma orilla del mar, donde se embarcaba la madera extraída de aquella zona? ¿Por qué lo hicimos? Ocurrió que en ese momento, el mes de mayo, se había producido el desembarco del “Corynthia” bajo la dirección de Calixto Sánchez White. Un fuerte sentimiento de solidaridad nos llevó a realizar el ataque contra la guarnición del Uvero. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: cubadebate.cu

item.content:encoded: Why Antivirus Companies Like Mine Failed to Catch Flame and Stuxnet - Wired News (blog): Telegraph.co.ukWhy Anti... http://t.co/9gyELp06 All antivirus companies, including F-Secure, missed detecting the Flame malware for two years, or more. That's a spectacular failure for our company, and for the antivirus industry in general, says Mikko Hypponen, chief security officer for Finnish security firm F-Secure. Link - Trackbacks

item.content:encoded: #tcot #tlot President Obama Shuns Lech Walesa http://t.co/m8U74iM1 Rory Cooper writes on NRO: Lech Walesa was once a trade-union activist. He was often arrested for speaking his mind against Communist oppression behind the Iron Curtain in Poland and for defying the Soviet Union. item.title: Adolf Hitler Custody Battle Ends In Heartbreak For Nazi Parents
item.description: Parents who named their son Adolf Hitler won't regain custody of their 4 kids http://t.co/ZT0tJNxg
item.content:encoded: Parents who named their son Adolf Hitler won't regain custody of their 4 kids http://t.co/ZT0tJNxg A New Jersey Superior Court judge ruled Thursday that a couple would not regain custody of their four children, three of whom are named in honor of prominent Nazi historical figures. Heath and Deborah Campbell, self-proclaimed Nazis from Holland Township, N.J., first made headlines in January 2009, when a store refused to decorate a birthday cake for their oldest child, Adolf Hitler Campbell, now 6. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: huffingtonpost.com
